name: Urban Fantasy Police Procedural
description: Complete genre pack for Urban Fantasy Police Procedural novels featuring supernatural investigations, magical crime-solving, and procedural authenticity blended with fantasy worldbuilding.
author: BQ Studio

series_planning: 1. Use urban-fantasy-world-template.md to establish magic system and supernatural society
2. Use detective-character-template.md for protagonist and team creation
3. Use procedural-setting-template.md to build investigation infrastructure
4. Apply series-arc-integration.md patterns for multi-book planning
review: 5. Invoke detective-logan agent for final procedural review

notes: This genre pack is designed to work seamlessly with the BQ Studio modular skill system
Skills will automatically load appropriate genre pack files based on user selection
Friends can clone the repo and create their own genre packs following this structure
All templates use markdown format for easy editing and version control
Validation rules can be run manually or integrated into automated review workflows
